name: Soul Search
description:
Gregg finds himself in an unfamiliar place, not remembering anything about his life or who he is. Help Gregg go through his old memories and figure out what happened to him!

This game was made as part of the Ludum Dare 44 Game Jam.
This can be played both in the browser and download (Windows only)

Controls:
Left/Right Arrow: Move
Space: Interact

Made By:
Naïma Kaadach
Nima Salami
Soren Bach Nielsen
